items.content_html: i guess it‚Äôs all just part of it. we love and we lose. we‚Äôre in motion until we‚Äôre not. time relentlessly, quietly lumbers on, and we find ourselves farther and farther from where we started. we know where we thought we‚Äôd be but not where we end up.

items.content_html:
Sasquatch coyly waved at me with a fleeting smile. ‚ÄúYour beer‚Äôs gone skunk,‚Äù they mumbled, lumbering away.

‚ÄúHow do you figure?‚Äù

‚ÄúMy nose is proportional to my feet. It‚Äôs skunk.‚Äù

And they were gone. The beer tasted fine. Not great, but fine.
